task.title: Explain live reload options for development
task.author: user

steps.summary: Asked about live reload options during development with rapid AI-driven file changes.
Checked repo guidance on dev workflows and hot reload (Makefile dev target, README dev section, blog note about Air). Evidence: README.md, Makefile, docs/blog-htmx-go-stack.md.
Confirmed install command in Makefile install-tools target (go install github.com/cosmtrek/air@latest). Evidence: Makefile.
Reported a conflict between Air and Go version and asked for investigation.
Reproduced install error; Go attempted toolchain switch to 1.25 and reported module path mismatch (cosmtrek -> air-verse). Evidence: go install output, Makefile.
Updated Makefile install-tools to use github.com/air-verse/air@latest to match the new module path.
Asked to find and pin an older Air version compatible with Go 1.24.
Queried available Air versions and inspected go.mod files to find the latest Go 1.24-compatible release (v1.62.0). Evidence: go list -m -versions github.com/air-verse/air, v1.62.0.mod.
Pinned Makefile install-tools to github.com/air-verse/air@v1.62.0 for Go 1.24 compatibility.
Searched docs/README for Air install references; no documentation mentions the install command, so no doc updates required. Evidence: README.md, docs/blog-htmx-go-stack.md.

final_summary: Identified the latest Air release compatible with Go 1.24 (v1.62.0) and pinned Makefile install-tools to github.com/air-verse/air@v1.62.0.
